name: Unity Assets And Legos Spaceship World
name_original: Unity Assets And Legos Spaceship World
description:
My last game made using ProBuilder didn't really work. So I thought I would cheer myself up by getting some free assets to play with.

I chose:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/creatures/alien-character-20...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/flooded-grounds-48529

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/templates/systems/easy-weapons-19365

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/3d-scifi-kit-starter-kit-9...
